about_the_game:
The best magic schools in the world meet regularly in the Mannaz arena, where the five paladins chosen by each school battle as a team to become, year after year, legends of the arena.

Each and every one of the thousands of schools fight at the end of each course, putting their prestige and legacy at stake, to achieve higher positions in the rankings. To achieve finally rise as the best academy for combat magicians in the world.

Feel spectacular fights of five against five, where to win there is no other objective than to destroy all members of the rival team. The only way to excellence is perseverance.


Create and appoint your own magic school, define your shield, customize your school and educate the best wizards in the world to compete and win in the exciting wizard battles in the Mannaz arena.


Fight against your friends and against users from all over the world in an exciting tactical player versus player battle where planning is everything. Test your intelligence and your ability to surprise your opponent in each fight.


Forget about the more classic experiences of the usual turn-based combat and welcome the simultaneous turn-solving system. Each player defines the actions of their magicians in the planning phase and these are executed simultaneously in a joint resolution phase, simulating a real battle with much more precision but maintaining all the essence and strategy of turn-based combat.


An immense amount of different spells and effects, which are generated by merging the most basic spells of each class of wizard, creating a wide range of powers available for each combat.


A skill rune system that will take your team of magicians customization options to the next level. You will enjoy endless customization options to define your fighting style. Assign, research, discover, and test hundreds of assignable abilities to each wizard so that your team can fully adapt to your favorite way of playing. We guarantee that each fight will be totally different from the previous one.
